locked_note: Funds are locked for 30 days. Early withdrawal = principal only, no yield.
display_only_note: All rewards/yields are displayed only; not withdrawable.
country_blocked: This app isn't available in your region.
about_text: InvestAi channels deposits into a smart crypto strategy. Yields shown are illustrative and accrue daily at 3% on total portfolio value.
terms_text: Users agree deposits remain locked for 30 days. Early withdrawals return principal without yield. Rewards and yields are displayed only and non-withdrawable.
